title: ACE & BUGGY!? JAYA ARC BEGINS || One Piece Episode 144 + 145 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering the beginning of the Jaya Arc, specifically episodes 144 and 145 of One Piece. The reactor experiences the debut of Masira and the discovery of the St. Briss ship that fell from the sky.
